settings.hero_body:
Grab Joe’s latest incredible Live And Direct album for just £14.99.
For a limited time only, this unlocks a secret EP deal!

settings.intro_heading: Joe Artist - Music for a new generation
settings.intro_text:
Welcome to the official Joe Artist website, where you can score the latest merch, listen and buy Joes incredible music and seek out new channels to follow Joe on his quest to conquer the world of music.

Did you hear about his new album? The critically acclaimed Joe Live and Direct is making waves throughout the industry. You can buy the album right here, along with other gems from his discography.

Got a friend who's into Joe in a big way? Check out the merch section for gift ideas including T shirts, caps, coffee mugs and more.

Don't forget to bookmark the site and come back regularly for up to the minute intel on his tour dates, new releases and updates from his socials.

Joe gonna love it!
